title: Keswick to Caldbeck Walking Route

images.title: Market Square, Keswick by Brian Clift, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Market Square, Keswick

images.title: David Purchase / The Cumbria Way near Skiddaw House
images.caption: The Cumbria Way near Skiddaw House (geograph 2699379)

images.title: Ian Taylor / Glenderaterra valley and Lonscale Fell
images.caption: Glenderaterra valley and Lonscale Fell. The bridleway from the Blencathra Centre crosses the Glenderaterra Beck and climbs up to meet the Cumbria Way. The snowy slopes of Little Man (NY2627) can just be seen above the cove on the NE side of Lonscale Fell.

images.title: Richard Webb / On Latrigg
images.caption: On Latrigg. Approaching the summit, the path using a bank that was an old boundary. View towards Grisedale Pike and Coledale.

images.title: Peter McDermott / Grainsgill Beck
images.caption: Grainsgill Beck. View looking up Grainsgill Beck seen from the bridge carrying the Cumbria Way down the valley of the River Caldew.

images.title: Andrew Smith / Pastures, Caldbeck
images.caption: Pastures, Caldbeck. A view across fields south of the village towards Carrock Fell (left of centre).

description: This is the fourth leg of the Cumbria Way taking you from Keswick to Caldbeck. You start off in Keswick and head north towards Skiddaw House passing Lonscale Fell and Latrigg Fell on the ascent. A short section along Grainsgill Beck takes you to Caldbeck Fells and High Pike, before descending towards the finish point at the village of Caldbeck .

details.subtitle: Pubs/Cafes
details.content: In Keswick the Lake Road Inn is a good choice for some post walk refreshments. The pub does good food and also has a nice garden area to sit out in if the weather is fine. You can find the pub on 10 Lake Road with a postcode of CA12 5BT for your sat navs. It's also dog friendly inside and outside if you have your canine friend with you.

display_address: 1, Victoria Street, Keswick, Cumberland, England, CA12 4NR, United Kingdom
